Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to service retirement of members of the New York city fire department pension fund
Summary: Provides that full escalation date means the first day of the month following the date on which a member completes or would have completed twenty-three years of credited service, with respect to service retirement benefits for uniformed members of the New York city fire department pension fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง510, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to service retirement of members of the New York city fire department pension fund
